message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering you the product for $825000. This is a very competitive price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $775000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
